prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is recommended for complex LLM-based generation tasks, separating code from prompts, orchestrating multiple prompts, and version control of prompts. It may not be suitable for simple single-prompt applications or when streaming is required.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, complex LLM-based generation, separating code, prompts, orchestrating, multiple prompts, version control, simple single-prompt applications, streaming
